title: Lavery's
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Western, Beer/Wine, British, English, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The city's oldest family-run bar is also a beer garden and a tourist attraction. In 2016 an update of the menu now includes a large variety of clearly labeled vegan dishes. In addition to that, some of the vegetarian choices can be made vegan upon request. Olive and sun-dried tomato salad, a vegan platter (sweet potato fries, chili, salsa, guacamole, etc.), sausages and mash, nachos, vegan sloppy joe burgers and sorbets for dessert. The Woodworkers is a social bar and rotating tap room situated in the building.
